1.summary: The novelty is primarily empirical with no significant technical contribution.
1.verbatim: The novelty is primarily empirical, and the technical approach is essentially an application of known techniques (the standard pretrain-finetune paradigm of LLMs).

2.summary: The reproducibility is questioned due to the absence of code in the supplementary material.
2.verbatim: The Supplementary Material only provides the data file. It is better to make the codes available for reproducing these results.
